channel.title: How make a new weapon for CS Source?
channel.description:
I haven't made a mod for CS Source, HL2 before! But it seem interesting to me^_^ I want to create a new weapon for CS Source, want add it into buy menu It's [b]G36k[/b] [img]https://www.terrorscout.com/airsoft/Pics/G36.jpg[/img] [img]https://media.vtc.vn/media/cf/newsimage/thumbnail/vtc_11503_kimtuthap3.jpg[/img] [img]https://media.vtc.vn/media/cf/newsimage/thumbnail/vtc_11505_kimtuthap5.jpg[/img]
What do I need? C++ skill, photoshop.....and..... :stuck_out_tongue:

item.title: How make a new weapon for CS Source?
item.dc:creator: Right4Dead
item.description:
Maxaxle:
  1. The weapon never took off because it overheated way too easily, was a plasti-gun, and the overheating fix did exactly shit.
Maxaxle:

…up a can of seriousfag on me…

:retard:

item.source: How make a new weapon for CS Source?

item.title: How make a new weapon for CS Source?
item.dc:creator: Maxaxle
item.description:
Kaze:

How the fuck is this relevant? He wants to put it into a video game, not a hostage rescue situation.

I could ask the same question about your pressing of the “Submit Reply” button.

A skin is a modification to the game, therefore it is a mod. Feel free to prove me wrong.

Playing dumb and not realizing he probably wants to make a skin (even though you completely acknowledged it in the line before this) and not a completely new extension of the game isn’t going to make anyone more happy here. Especially not me.

Holy crap, I wasn’t expecting you to open up a can of seriousfag on me…
leaves

Read full topic
item.source: How make a new weapon for CS Source?

item.title: How make a new weapon for CS Source?
item.dc:creator: Kaze
item.description:
Maxaxle:
  1. The weapon never took off because it overheated way too easily, was a plasti-gun, and the overheating fix did exactly shit.

How the fuck is this relevant? He wants to put it into a video game, not a hostage rescue situation.

  1. Why?

I could ask the same question about your pressing of the “Submit Reply” button.

  1. Skins =/= Mods, and there are tons of skins.

A skin is a modification to the game, therefore it is a mod. Feel free to prove me wrong.

  1. You’ll have to wait for the game to be released to insert that proof of concept of a gun.

Playing dumb and not realizing he probably wants to make a skin (even though you completely acknowledged it in the line before this) and not a completely new extension of the game isn’t going to make anyone more happy here. Especially not me.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Maxaxle
item.description:
1. The weapon never took off because it overheated way too easily, was a plasti-gun, and the overheating fix did exactly shit.
  2. Why?
  3. Skins =/= Mods, and there are tons of skins.
  4. You’ll have to wait for the game to be released to insert that proof of concept of a gun.
